content.question: How many centers does a triangle have?
At a party, everyone shook hands with everybody else. There were 66 handshakes. How many people were at the party?
If you have a piece of paper that is 0.1mm thick, how many times will you have to fold it in half in order for it to become tall enough to reach to the Moon?
What does it actually mean when someone says “There is a 30% chance of rain in New York tomorrow”?
choices: It will rain on 30 percent of New York at some point during the day
It will rain for 30 percent of the day, on average, over all of New York
For every 10 days like today, it will rain on 3 of the following days
The volume of rain that will fall in New York will be 30 per cent of a full day’s rain

content.question: How many friends do you need to have in order for it to be more likely than not that two of them share the same birthday?
If you choose an answer to this question at random, what is the probability that you will be correct?
A car is driving at 100mph down a straight road. What is the speed of each of its wheels at the point where they touch the ground?
You’ve invited ten people over for dinner. How many different ways are there to arrange them around a circular table?
